/Users/akin/Desktop/picus-business-case/.serviceRawFile:
# "org" ensures this Service is used with the correct Serverless Framework Access Key.
org: akinozen
# "app" enables Serverless Framework Dashboard features and sharing them with other Services.
app: picus-delete-lambda
# "service" is the name of this project. This will also be added to your AWS resource names.
service: picus-delete-lambda
provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: python3.9
  region: eu-central-1

  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - dynamodb:DeleteItem
      Resource: !Sub "${ssm:/Picus/DynamoDB/Arn}"

functions:
  deleteItem:
    handler: handler.delete_item
    events:
      - http:
          path: picus/{key}
          method: delete

plugins:
  - serverless-python-requirements

custom:
  pythonRequirements:
    dockerizePip: false

resources:
  Resources:
    PicusDeleteLambdaExecutionRole:
      Type: AWS::IAM::Role
      Properties:
        AssumeRolePolicyDocument:
          Version: '2012-10-17'
          Statement:
            - Effect: Allow
              Principal:
                Service:
                  - lambda.amazonaws.com
              Action: sts:AssumeRole
        Policies:
          - PolicyName: PicusDeleteLambdaPolicy
            PolicyDocument:
              Version: '2012-10-17'
              Statement:
                - Effect: Allow
                  Action:
                    - logs:CreateLogGroup
                    - logs:CreateLogStream
                    - logs:PutLogEvents
                    - dynamodb:DeleteItem
                  Resource: 
                    - !Sub "${ssm:/Picus/DynamoDB/Arn}"
